original_solution_mapping.L1: Since 5 students from each of the 6 math classes have volunteered, there are 5*6= <<5*6=30>>30 total student volunteers.
original_solution_mapping.L2: In addition to the 30 student volunteers, 13 teachers have also volunteered so there are 30+13= <<30+13=43>>43 total volunteers.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Mr. Johnson needs 50 volunteers and currently has 43 volunteers, so he needs 50-43= <<50-43=7>>7 more volunteers.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3477.
    Returns: the number of additional volunteers Mr. Johnson needs.
    """
    # L1
    students_per_class = 5 # 5 students from each of the school’s 6 math classes
    num_math_classes = 6 # 6 math classes
    total_student_volunteers = students_per_class * num_math_classes

    # L2
    teacher_volunteers = 13 # 13 teachers have also volunteered
    current_total_volunteers = total_student_volunteers + teacher_volunteers

    # L3
    volunteers_needed = 50 # needs 50 volunteers
    additional_volunteers_needed = volunteers_needed - current_total_volunteers

    # FA
    answer = additional_volunteers_needed
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Since {students_per_class} students from each of the {num_math_classes} math classes have volunteered, there are {students_per_class}*{num_math_classes}= <<{students_per_class}*{num_math_classes}={total_student_volunteers}>>{total_student_volunteers} total student volunteers.

In addition to the {total_student_volunteers} student volunteers, {teacher_volunteers} teachers have also volunteered so there are {total_student_volunteers}+{teacher_volunteers}= <<{total_student_volunteers}+{teacher_volunteers}={current_total_volunteers}>>{current_total_volunteers} total volunteers.

Mr. Johnson needs {volunteers_needed} volunteers and currently has {current_total_volunteers} volunteers, so he needs {volunteers_needed}-{current_total_volunteers}= <<{volunteers_needed}-{current_total_volunteers}={additional_volunteers_needed}>>{additional_volunteers_needed} more volunteers.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Since 5 students from each of the 6 math classes have volunteered, there are 5*6= <<5*6=30>>30 total student volunteers.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: In addition to the 30 student volunteers, 5 teachers have also volunteered so there are 30+5= <<30+5=35>>35 total volunteers.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Mr. Johnson needs 50 volunteers and currently has 35 volunteers, so he needs 50-35= <<50-35=15>>15 more volunteers.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'students_per_class' (5) was used instead of 'teacher_volunteers' (13).
